collectible.title: Nagamimi Plush
collectible.subtitle: A plushie of Nagamimi's original form.
collectible.text: A plush toy depicting Nagamimi's original form. Comes with over 700 custom insults that play when you squeeze her!

collectible.title: Nagamimi's Hat
collectible.subtitle: A tiny top hat worn by an "mega cute Nagamimi-type life form".
collectible.text: A tiny top hat worn by a "mega-cute Nagamimi type life form".
collectible.unlock: Play 3 games against Nagamimi and 3 other characters with the "mean" tag.
